price: "Sen ancak bizim gibi bir beşersin ve muhakkak biz seni yalancılardan sanıyoruz."
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā anta illā basharun mith'lunā wa-in naẓunnuka lamina al-kādhibīna
